com.credenceid.biometrics

Interface Biometrics.FingerprintReaderStatusListener

  • Enclosing interface:
    Biometrics

    public static interface Biometrics.FingerprintReaderStatusListener
    Interface definition for callbacks to be invoked when a request to Biometrics.openFingerprintReader(FingerprintReaderStatusListener fingerprintReaderStatusListener) returns with result.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void onCloseFingerprintReader(Biometrics.ResultCode resultCode, Biometrics.CloseReasonCode reasonCode)
      Invoked when a request to Biometrics.closeFingerprintReader() returns with result or fingerprint reader closes for any other Biometrics.CloseReasonCode.
      void onOpenFingerprintReader(Biometrics.ResultCode resultCode, java.lang.String status)
      Invoked when a request to Biometrics.openFingerprintReader(FingerprintReaderStatusListener) returns with result.

    • Method Detail

      • onOpenFingerprintReader

        void onOpenFingerprintReader(Biometrics.ResultCode resultCode,
                             java.lang.String status)
        Invoked when a request to Biometrics.openFingerprintReader(FingerprintReaderStatusListener) returns with result.
        Parameters:
        resultCode - Biometrics.ResultCode.OK if sensor was successfully opened. Biometrics.ResultCode.FAIL} if sensor failed to open.. Biometrics.ResultCode.INTERMEDIATE} is returned while sensor is opening. This code may be returned multiple times depending on different steps required to open fingerprint. This should be paired with "status"to see what is going on.
        status - Text indicating operations progress. Some sample statuses that may be returned are as follows.
        Opening fingerprint...
        Place finger on sensor...
        Failed to open fingerprint sensor.

      • onCloseFingerprintReader

        void onCloseFingerprintReader(Biometrics.ResultCode resultCode,
                              Biometrics.CloseReasonCode reasonCode)
        Invoked when a request to Biometrics.closeFingerprintReader() returns with result or fingerprint reader closes for any other Biometrics.CloseReasonCode.
        Parameters:
        resultCode - Biometrics.ResultCode.OK if fingerprint reader was successfully closed. Biometrics.ResultCode.FAIL} if fingerprint reader failed to close. Biometrics.ResultCode.INTERMEDIATE} this code is never returned for this API.
        reasonCode - See Biometrics.CloseReasonCode.
